text: 16.19: Ais 51.17; Jer 25.15-16; VB 14.8-10; 17.18; 18.5Mba khɨmkhɨk mbuim, Babiron ŋgu bakɨme rɨgɨra shɨgeregap, fɨga mpuani khegene ga gegi. Kha nuianan ki ŋgui bakɨvi za mbatɨgi. Fhe Bakɨme mba Babiron ŋgu bakɨme muuŋgi tɨvi ga ndɨrgap, ana Babiron ŋgu bakɨme muuŋgim, ana won wain mbɨ thama pi. Mba wain mbɨn tham, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨmen ndav shɨrɨ bakɨ guar ma.
